snippet: Frederick Woods, 64, the last of three men convicted of hijacking a school bus full of children nearly four decades ago was denied parole for the 16th time on Thursday.
abstract: Frederick Woods is denied parole for 16th time; Woods is last of three men who were convicted of hijacking school bus and kidnapping 26 children and driver of bus near Chowchilla, Calif, in 1976; two other men have already been released.
lead_paragraph: Frederick Woods, 64, the last of three men convicted of hijacking a school bus full of children nearly four decades ago was denied parole for the 16th time on Thursday.

headline.main: California: Parole Denied for Man Who Helped Hijack School Bus in 1976
headline.print_headline: California: Parole Denied for Man Who Helped Hijack School Bus in 1976
